Downloadable templates

Document templates for Key Technical Decisions. Download the one that best fits your tools.

Google doc

Google document format. It contains dropdown elements for the tag labels already formatted. This is the base document from which all the others are generated.

Open template
HTML plain

HTML document with minimum formatting and clean code. Its purpose is to adapt it to any system that uses HTML templates.

Download template
Open Document format

ODT file for Libre Office. I has dropdowns for the tag choices, but no color formatting. It has been exported from the Google document.

Download template
Microsoft Word 2007

DOCX file for Microsoft Office. It has been exported from the Google document.

Download template
Markdown

Markdown file without any styling. It has no dropdown elements or lists for the tag labels.

Open template
